decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (8365-A-001-T1, 8365-A-002-T1, 8365-A-003, 8365-A-004-T1, 8365-A-005-T1, 8365-A-006-T1, 8365-A-007, 8365-A-008, 8365-A-009, 8365-A-010 received 13/06/2013 and Travel Plan (ref. 7373/001/05 dated July 2013) received 01/08/2013) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.

Condition : 3 - The premises shall be used for educational facility and for no other purpose (including any other purpose in Class D1 of the Schedule to the Town and Country Planning (Use Classes) Order 1987, or in any provision equivalent to that Class in any statutory instrument revoking and re-enacting that Order with or without modification).
Condition : 4 - No fans, louvres, ducts or other external plant shall be installed without the prior approval of the Local Planning Authority.
Condition : 5 - The use hereby permitted shall not be open to students outside the following times 0800-1900.

Condition : 6 - Before first occupation of the building, the approved Travel Plan (dated July 2013) shall be implemented in accordance with the details contained within this plan. In particular the Travel Plan shall: 
i)	Commit to undertake an iTRACE compliant site audit and staff/visitor travel survey to gauge current travel behaviour. The survey must be re-run every year for a total period of 5 years and if requested in writing, a copy of the survey results shall be submitted to the Local Planning Authority.
ii)	Provide an action plan within three months of occupation setting out (with SMART objectives and targets) how the school intends to communicate and promote sustainable transport options to staff and students - e.g. provision of bus route information, information about cycle training opportunities, salary sacrifice scheme etc. 
iii)	Register a named travel plan champion at http://hounslowtp.org/ 
The Travel Plan (dated July 2013) shall be undertaken and maintained as approved.
description: Variation of condition 2 (approved plans) of permission 00707/390/P3 dated 11 Feburary 2011 for change of use from offices (B1a) to a non-residential institution (Use Class D1) to allow changes to the approved development (including erection of fencing, formation of a bin store, submission of a travel plan and travel survey and a reduction in the number of on-site parking spaces) and Conditions 6 & 7 (travel survey & sustainable transport) to allow submission outside of the 4 month period required by the permission.
